Name: panasonic ave3 - hardcore mod
Description:
modified version of the classic video mixer; panasonic ave3.

external controller w/ 20 bendable points, ON/OFF - SOFT/HARD feedback and quantity, 6 2p switches to GND and 6 asignable switches plus banana-minijack adapters.
